package.name: m2_xarm6_planning_and_traj_execution
package.description: A meta computational graph that uses [moveit2](https://github.com/ros-planning/moveit2) to compute motion planning and perform trajectory execution on a UFACTORY xArm6 manipulator. Used to demonstrate a complex tranformation using the [geometry2](https://github.com/ros2/geometry2) package.
package.author: Alejandra Martínez Fariña
